Changelog:
Build 2024.4.9.1072
- Fixed Global Scale.
- Reordered Render draw calls.
- Added ImGui Metrics Debugger to Debug window.

Build 2024.4.9.354
- Fixed Global Scale.

Build 2024.4.8.361
- Fixed Global Scale saving as 0.

Build 2024.4.7.1409
- Added Event Unicasts / Targeted Events. (Revision 3. Unreleased.)
- Changed Translations to always fallback to English if the requested locale is not available.
- Fixed JPG and other 24bit Textures not displaying correctly.
- Fixed addon messages accidentally using printf when displayed in the log window.
- Added a global scale variable to help with high (and low) DPI screens.
- Reworked the ctag logic entirely.
- Added the duration for Addon loading and unloading to the log message to help developers debug.
- Fixed a game crash when multiboxing without explicitly setting the -mumble parameter.
- Changed the Disable Until Update logic to only trigger on "bigger" updates.
- Fixed linebreaks not displaying correctly in the log window.
- Added GUI Alerts / Notifications. (Revision 3. Unreleased.)
- Added a counter to each events in the debug window showing how many times an event was raised.
- Added a library for ArcDPS legacy plugins that aren't supporting Nexus yet.
- Added Terms of Service notices to some addons.

Build 2024.3.21.981
- Fixed a rare client crash when the game updated and you ran any dll in debug mode. (Thanks belst.)

Build 2024.3.17.1229
- Added Localisation support for QuickAccess Locations.
- Improved Mumble::IsGameplay being set to false when the game freezes.
- Added new strings showing when updates are being checked in the Addons window.
- QuickAccess now lights up if it's set to Extend and the native game icons are hovered.
- Added ArcDPS Integration support even when ArcDPS is not loaded via Nexus e.g. Proxy, Chainload, AddonLoader.
- Added support for user-defined textures. Placing /addons/Nexus/Textures/someIdentifier.png will override when someIdentifier would be loaded instead.
- Added glyph ranges for Cyrillic and some eastern European languages.

Build 2024.3.13.1347
- Added QuickAccessIconsCount (32bit), QuickAccessMode (32bit) and QuickAccessIsVertical (32bit) to NexusLink for external overlays to respect Nexus.
